title: >>> HOME For The HOLIDAY
body_text:
THANKSGIVING SPECIAL Results!
WALL v. ALL 4
The feverishly awaited fourth installment in a war five arduous months in the making. The alliances have boldly, brashly kicked each others' ass from heaven all the way down to hell, and with no dissolution in sight.
Team WALL opened things up with the inaugural victory of this monumental clash. The resiliency and aggressiveness of their never-say-die rivals however was proven mighty and strong - Team ALL racked up two consecutive triumphs grabbing the early edge heading into the second hour. Had it become all too reminiscent of the
shocking third encounter
- and a glimpse into the immediate future? Not exactly.
Things looked bleak following the sudden departures of powerhouse Kevin Megill and later Rob Avakian, both of whom had done their fair share of methodical catching and eliminations. Plus, with the additions of superpower Justin Pierce and the returning Kurt Gassner on WALL, the visitors' offensive was shot down almost immediately. The hometown heroes regained and then stretched the advantage into the late night hours, earning a massive seven by the conclusion of CX3.
ALL's inability to regenerate, coupled with the overwhelming resources and experience of their opposition caused ALL's downfall.
Flash Results by Game
: 1, 4, 5, 6, 7, 8, 9 (WALL); 2, 3 (ALL)
Team WALL, the "Indians" if you will, remain the dominating force in this feud-of-the-year contender.
WALL defeated ALL, 7 to 2
.
Moments & Stars
: Kevin Fitzpatrick busting Kristen Driscoll's lip due to a vicious bulletball to the face; Bobby Vetrano's magnificant dodges; Kevin Fitzpatrick receiving a nutshot following an accidental deflection by teammate Justin Pierce
The YEARBOOK
Members of "Team ALL 4" came from the following high schools:
Allentown
(DiBuccio)
; M.A.S.T.
(Cornero)
; Monmouth Regional
(Tronolone)
; Red Bank Catholic
(Driscoll)
; Ocean Township
(Edwards, Spirito, Vetrano)
; Neptune
(R. Brown, M. Brown, Butler)
; Manasquan
(Avakian, Harley, Krott, Lewis, Londono, Megill, Raspanti, Stopa)
DODGEBALL CXV Mid-Season Main Event Blockbuster Announcement!
It was revealed at this 113th spectacular that on December 8 at
DODGEBALL CXV
(115), six of the most recognized names in the colorful history of the game will do battle in a special three-versus-three, "War to Settle the Scores" encounter.
The deadly alliance of
Juan Londono
,
Ray Marzarella
, and
Kevin Fitzpatrick
will join forces to battle an elite trio in
Rob Avakian
,
Sascha Basista
, and
Chris Adams
! Stayed tuned to
dodgeball.livejournal.com
in the coming week for all the details concerning this explosive collision!
RECORDS
> Attendance: 32
> Notable Returns: Matt Raspanti (last competed at DB XXV)*; Bobby Vetrano (last competed at DB 71); Kurt Gassner (last competed at DB 88)
> New Players: (3) Marc Spirito, Margaret Harley, Nick Marabeti
- DODGEBALL CX3 featured the fourth
WALL vs. ALL
encounter. Team WALL captured wins in the first two matches, while Team ALL took the third. Team WALL would regain the advantage in this war, winning 7 to 2 at CX3.
Online Exclusive!
The brains behind the
WALL v. ALL
battles can be credited to both John Tronolone and even more so, Ryan Letsche. And to think it all began with a pad, a pen, and Starbucks coffee some five months ago.
PAM vs. VALERIE
PickYourPoison Rules at DODGEBALL 114
The wild women are taking over. Veteran
Valerie Winston
wrestles with newcomer to the captains circle,
Pam D'Luhy
. The special
PickYourPoison
team selection stipulation is in effect.
Don't miss out on this first-time meeting between two of the most dominant females in the game's history. Catch it live
December 1
.
body_html:
THANKSGIVING SPECIAL Results!
WALL v. ALL 4
The feverishly awaited fourth installment in a war five arduous months in the making. The alliances have boldly, brashly kicked each others' ass from heaven all the way down to hell, and with no dissolution in sight.

Team WALL opened things up with the inaugural victory of this monumental clash. The resiliency and aggressiveness of their never-say-die rivals however was proven mighty and strong - Team ALL racked up two consecutive triumphs grabbing the early edge heading into the second hour. Had it become all too reminiscent of the shocking third encounter - and a glimpse into the immediate future? Not exactly.

Things looked bleak following the sudden departures of powerhouse Kevin Megill and later Rob Avakian, both of whom had done their fair share of methodical catching and eliminations. Plus, with the additions of superpower Justin Pierce and the returning Kurt Gassner on WALL, the visitors' offensive was shot down almost immediately. The hometown heroes regained and then stretched the advantage into the late night hours, earning a massive seven by the conclusion of CX3.

ALL's inability to regenerate, coupled with the overwhelming resources and experience of their opposition caused ALL's downfall.

Flash Results by Game: 1, 4, 5, 6, 7, 8, 9 (WALL); 2, 3 (ALL)

Team WALL, the "Indians" if you will, remain the dominating force in this feud-of-the-year contender. WALL defeated ALL, 7 to 2.

Moments & Stars: Kevin Fitzpatrick busting Kristen Driscoll's lip due to a vicious bulletball to the face; Bobby Vetrano's magnificant dodges; Kevin Fitzpatrick receiving a nutshot following an accidental deflection by teammate Justin Pierce

The YEARBOOK
Members of "Team ALL 4" came from the following high schools:
Allentown (DiBuccio); M.A.S.T. (Cornero); Monmouth Regional (Tronolone); Red Bank Catholic (Driscoll); Ocean Township (Edwards, Spirito, Vetrano); Neptune (R. Brown, M. Brown, Butler); Manasquan (Avakian, Harley, Krott, Lewis, Londono, Megill, Raspanti, Stopa)

DODGEBALL CXV Mid-Season Main Event Blockbuster Announcement!
It was revealed at this 113th spectacular that on December 8 at DODGEBALL CXV(115), six of the most recognized names in the colorful history of the game will do battle in a special three-versus-three, "War to Settle the Scores" encounter.

The deadly alliance of Juan Londono, Ray Marzarella, and Kevin Fitzpatrick will join forces to battle an elite trio in Rob Avakian, Sascha Basista, and Chris Adams! Stayed tuned to dodgeball.livejournal.com in the coming week for all the details concerning this explosive collision!

RECORDS
> Attendance: 32
> Notable Returns: Matt Raspanti (last competed at DB XXV)*; Bobby Vetrano (last competed at DB 71); Kurt Gassner (last competed at DB 88)
> New Players: (3) Marc Spirito, Margaret Harley, Nick Marabeti

- DODGEBALL CX3 featured the fourth WALL vs. ALL encounter. Team WALL captured wins in the first two matches, while Team ALL took the third. Team WALL would regain the advantage in this war, winning 7 to 2 at CX3.

Online Exclusive!
The brains behind the WALL v. ALL battles can be credited to both John Tronolone and even more so, Ryan Letsche. And to think it all began with a pad, a pen, and Starbucks coffee some five months ago.

PAM vs. VALERIE
PickYourPoison Rules at DODGEBALL 114

The wild women are taking over. Veteran Valerie Winston wrestles with newcomer to the captains circle, Pam D'Luhy. The special PickYourPoison team selection stipulation is in effect.

Don't miss out on this first-time meeting between two of the most dominant females in the game's history. Catch it live December 1.
